title.content-text: 8.2.2 - Analyzing the Effects of the Wild-card Mask

brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts the effects of the wild-card mask.

Network Topology
A router has an ACL outbound on S0/0/0. This router is connected to four networks on Fast Ethernet ports.

Networks 192.168.77.192 /26 and 192.168.77.128 /26 are blocked.

Networks 192.168.77.64 /26 and 192.168.77.0 /26 are ok.

OPTION A
access-list 55 permit 192.168.77.0 0.0.0.63
access-list 55 permit 192.168.77.64 0.0.0.63
(implied deny any)

OPTION B
access-list 5 permit 192.168.77.0 0.0.0.127
(implied deny any)
